title: Cucumber Honeydew Salad
directions: Mix together honeydew melon, cucumbers, red onion and mint in a large bowl. Add olive oil and toss to coat. Stir in lemon juice, salt, and pepper to taste. Cover and refrigerate  until chilled, about 40 minutes.
ingredients: 1 honeydew melon - peeled, seeded and cubed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
